description: The Men’s Paramount Convertible Pants are made for those steep, challenging, rewarding off-the-grid days. With plenty of stretch, articulated knees for mobility, and FlashDry-XD™ fabrics, these are the all-purpose hiking pants you’ve been searching for. When the temperatures rise, they can easily transform into 9" shorts.
name: The North Face Paramount Convertible Pants, Reg - Mens
